message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $100 is a good one, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $110.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $90 is getting closer to my minimum, but I'm still a bit hesitant to sell at that price. I'm willing to compromise and sell the product to you for $95.
I'm getting close to your price, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Can you meet me at that price?
Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $85 is getting very close to my minimum, but I'm still not willing to sell at that price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $87.50.
I'm really close to walking away, but I'll try one more time. I'm willing to pay $82.50 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
